column2: 44c}}, pp. 35-36</ref> or "'to the object' hence 'up to, to (reach), as far as'", said to be a "preposition originally adverb".<ref name=PE17>{{PE

column1: When followed by a word beginning in a similar vowel, ''tenna'' takes an [[Wikipedia:Elision
column2: elided]] form (''tenn’'').<ref>Petri Tikka, "[http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/PE17.html Quenya Words in Parma Eldalamberon 17]" at [http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/index.html Men Eldalambínen] (accessed 13 June 2011)</ref>
